reviews.text: Fabulous.  Loved the luxurious opulent decor.  We stayed in a suite overlooking the garden.  It was perfect.  The bathtub and shower were amazing.  The staff were lovely and very helpful regarding our missing luggage which didn't make the flight with us.  It's just a shame are flight was delayed and we missed a night but our suite was ready and waiting for us when we arrived early the next morning Well located close to the station.  Very clean and comfortable.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Savoy Cologne during my visit to the city, and I must say, it was an enjoyable experience from start to finish. Upon entering the hotel, I was immediately struck by the impeccable design and attention to detail in the room. Every aspect of the decor seemed to have been carefully chosen, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. It was evident that the room had been designed with love and a keen eye for aesthetics!
The staff at Hotel Savoy Cologne truly went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and comfortable during my stay. From the moment I checked in, their warm-hearted and friendly demeanor made me feel right at home. They were always available to assist with any inquiries or requests, ensuring that my needs were met promptly and efficiently. One of the highlights of my stay was the breathtaking view from the rooftop of the hotel. Whether it was during the day or at night, the view never failed to captivate me, and I found myself spending hours simply gazing out at the city below. To top it all off, the food and drinks served on the rooftop were absolutely delicious.

This hotel was a disappointment and we didn't stay the night here. The service was good and friendly but most other areas didn't meet our expectations. First, walking from the train at night took us through an area/underpass that was sketchy. But, mostly the hotel room furnishings are outdated and very tired. Besides that the odor in the room triggered my allergies that had been dormant for a long time. To try to combat the smell they use a heavy perfume deodorizer. The highway outside of the hotel was loud too. Our room was expensive compared to local, nearby chain hotels.  We wanted to stay in a locally owned boutique hotel but this one didn't meet the mark!
